thread.title: Credit Suisse, Barclays could pay up to $150m to settle ‘dark pool’ claims
thread.title_full: Credit Suisse, Barclays could pay up to $150m to settle ‘dark pool’ claims

author: Financial News
title: Credit Suisse, Barclays could pay up to $150m to settle ‘dark pool’ claims
text:
Credit Suisse, Barclays could pay up to $150m to settle ‘dark pool’ claims By Christopher M Matthews and Bradley Hope, WSJ 23 October 2015 Credit Suisse and Barclays are in discussions to pay as much as $150 million combined to end several investigations and one lawsuit alleging improprieties related to their “dark pools,” according to people familiar with the matter.
